description: Get up-to-date weather forecast for any location.

blocks.name: getWeatherForecast
blocks.description: This endpoint allows to receive weather information.

args.name: woeid
args.info: The location for the weather forecast as a WOEID, example is 2487889 (San Diego, CA). Required if location not provided.

args.name: location
args.info: The location for the weather forecast as Text, example "chicago, il". Required if woeid not provided.

args.name: filter
args.info: The comma-separated filter of data to be received. For example: wind, item.condition.text, astronomy.sunset. See README for more details and examples.

args.name: yql
args.info: Your custom yql expression. Example: "select item.condition from weather.forecast where woeid = 2487889". NOTE: If provided yql parameter, other parameters will be ignored.
